text: Carrageenan - induced mouse paw oedema is frequently used to determine the anti - inflammatory activity of diverse bioactive compounds such as plant extracts and essential oils [ 87 ] [ 88 ] [ 89 ] [ 90 ] [ 91 ] [ 92 ] [ 93 ] [ 94 ] [ 95 ] . If this method allows screening the anti - inflammatory of samples , very little information is given about its mechanism .
